text: I badly want to switch from Sublime to VSCode, but it seems like VSCode is unstable. I _very_ frequently get these crash reports. Does anyone else get these? Is there a work-around?

elements.text: I badly want to switch from Sublime to VSCode, but it seems like VSCode is unstable. I
frequently get these crash reports. Does anyone else get these? Is there a work-around?
